amendatorysection.para: Each member of the Legislature shall receive a salary in an amount equal to the maximum authorized by the Constitution of Nebraska. Such salary shall be paid in equal monthly installments.

source.para: Laws 1960, Seventy-first Spec. Sess., c. 1, § 1, p. 59;
Laws 1968, Seventy-ninth Spec. Sess., c. 2, § 1, p. 3251;
